com.colofabrix.mathparser.struct.builders

Class DefaultContextBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.colofabrix.mathparser.struct.builders.DefaultContextBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextBuilder

    public final class DefaultContextBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements ContextBuilder
    Creates a context

    Creates and initialise a context. Optionally can create a default context with default values

    Author:
    Fabrizio Colonna

      • DefaultContextBuilder

        public DefaultContextBuilder(OperatorsSetter operators,
                     MemorySetter memory)
        Constructor

        If one of the parameters is null the corresponding section will not be initialised

        Parameters:
        operators - The OperatorSetter used to initialise operators. Can be null
        memory - The MemorySetter used to initialise the memory. Can be null

        public static Context createDefault()
        Creates a Context with the default values

      • create

        public Context create()
        Description copied from interface: ContextBuilder
        Create a new context

        A context is the pair that identifies a working area for the operators
        The new context will be applied every time ContextBuilder.create() is called

        Specified by:
        create in interface ContextBuilder
        Returns:
        true if the context is renewed, false otherwise.
